sentence.Network_en: The transferee or heritor of shares shall succeed the rights and obligations oftransfer or ancestor.
sentence.Network_cn: 社股受让人或继承人,应承继让与人或被继承人之权利义务.

PerfectNetExp.abs: premonitor 预先警告者，预先告诫者heritor 继承人，嗣子inheritor 继承人，后继人

list.abs: article 50 The trustor or the heritor thereof may rescind the trust if the trustor is the only beneficiary . if there are otherwise provisions in the trust documents , those provisions shall be followed .第五十条委托人是唯一受益人的，委托人或者其继承人可以解除信托。信托文件另有规定的，从其规定。
The trustor or its heritor ., 委托人或者其继承人.
The trustor or its heritor ., 委托人或者其继承人.
he purports himself to be the only legal heritor .他声称自己是唯一合法的继承人。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French heriter, based on Latin hereditarius (see hereditary). The spelling change in the 16th cent. was by association with words ending in -or

means.word_mean: 1. a person who is entitled by law or by the terms of a will to inherit the estate of another
